title: The First Tacoma Narrows Bridge – Galloping Gertie
itunes:title: The First Tacoma Narrows Bridge – Galloping Gertie
description:
The drama of the first Tacoma Narrows bridge is hardly relegated to its turbulent end. There’s more to the story – from its inception to financing issues to some surprising legal happenings, and how it spawned entirely new approaches to bridge design.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
